body.p:
Mercer County Sct
To the Governor of Kentucky

Your Petitioner Thos Edwards states he is County Judge of Mercer County that James Lawson is indicted in the Mercer Circuit Court for feloniously murdering one "Bud" Bosley & has fled from justice & is now running at large to the great terror of the good citizens of this Commonwealth
The killing of Bosly by Lawson was without any provocation whatever & was in law & fact a most outrageous murder -- Lawson is a desperado who defies all law civil & military

The ends of justice cannot be satisfied without his arrest which cannot be accomplished without a reward of at least the full amount authorized by law being offered -- Peace has come but order cannot be restored till those who are lawbreakers are made to feel the penalties of the Law. I most humbly but most earnestly petition
Your Excellency to offer a reward of Five Hundred Dollars for the apprehension of this despeate outlaw & his delivery to the Jailer of Mercer County to answer this most flagrant Murder -- & as in duty bound will ever pray &c

Thos Edwards
Presiding Judge of Mercer County

Reward of $300.
Jas Lawson for murder of Bud Bosley
Mercer Co
23d Nov/65
